text: Kalli Purie is an Indian journalist, and news executive. She is Vice Chairperson, and Executive Editor-in-Chief of the India Today Group. == Career == She graduated from St Hugh's College, University of Oxford. She was Editorial Director for Broadcast . In 2017, she was named Vice Chairperson. == Works == * Confessions of a Serial Dieter, 2012. == References == == Other websites == * Kalli Purie In Conversation With AI Visionaries Stuart Russell & Lauren Woodman Of DataKind 2024 Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Indian journalists
title: Kalli Purie
